name: e-days
overview:
e-days is a web-based staff holiday planner and sickness management solution for businesses ranging in size from 20 to +15,000 staff.

e-days operates a staff ‘self-service’ model, allowing staff to login on-line, view their absence entitlements and then request absence through the flexible booking engine. The entire system is underpinned by email and integrates seamlessly with MS Outlook. Staff managers are alerted to absence requests by email and they authorise or reject staff absence by the click of a button.

Other items of functionality cover: staff sickness management, automatic Bradford Factor scoring, overtime tracking, time off in lieu, absence carry-over, absence allowances, multi-site/multi-location, absence calendars, reporting, data export and more…

Key benefits: time saving for managers/HR, greater productivity of staff, accurate and easily accessible absence data, reduced unplanned absenteeism, tightening up of absence processes, central repository of absence data.

e-days is owned, supplied, developed and maintained by Senior Internet Ltd
